review: Very honest.saved my mother.thanks to Mr tanuj Basu,baisakhi mam and all supporting staff.** ****** ** **** ** ******* ** ******* *********
** ** **** **** ************* my father in law his patients from last 23 yrs. he trust him blindly. Most of all his behavior and treatment with patient is very good.

It was a leadless pacemaker implementation for my Father, the operation went for long long time, it was not possible to get the best position in the heart where the result will be utmost, Sir showed extreme patience and skills to operate for such a long hours, and end of the day the operation was successful, and my father is doing well. I sincerely thank him from bottom of my heart, I also want to convey my thanks to Mr Tanuj Basu(Manager B M Birla) for his support and co-operation.

I have taken consultation for my father for cardiology concern and visited the hospital. ****** *** **** **** *** he had done the check up, After that he has prescribed the some medicines for my father. We are 100% satisfied with this doctor treatment and would like to recommend this doctor for other friends and family members so that it will useful for them also

My mother had chest pain & heart problem we were consulting other doctor but it did not work out for my mother so we consulted Dr. Anil Mishra he treated my mother really well he asked us to take some tests which we did  & came to conclusion that we should do a angioplasty the treatment is still going on I am satisfied with the consultation
Doctor's explanation and communication are too good.The whole process start from appoinment to checkup is satisfactory.
Very good and humble human being .one of the most experienced cardiologist in Kolkata with a good amount of expertise
I am satisfied with the consultation the doctor asked us to get some tests after the tests we should admit her in the hospital over all I am satisfied with the appointment
